title: Couple of CSing questions
body:
By 10 minutes, depending on what champion I'm playing, I'm normally on about 70 cs. 80 if I'm on a really easy CS-er. What's a good number to have by 20 minutes?

Also, I play Mid mostly and I find it incredibly hard to farm in the mid game because everyone is in Mid. EVERYONE. What do I do then?

replies.body: And on top of this remember that if your roaming, your probably gonna give up at least a few CS and a good roam can be worth a wave of CS.

10 cs per minute is awesome and is what you wanna aim for.

I think the best I've ever done is like 8.5 cs a min. Average like 6.5 a min. But im just a silver scrub.

If you are seiging and getting tower pressure then its fine. However if 3-4 waves go by and nothing has happened, just go farm jungle camps like Wolves or Raptors between waves or go to another lane and push it out if nothing is happening.
gg boards bugged and i posted twice
